value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security. value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other.
